definition: key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind
Yokosuka (port and navy base in the Tokyo bay)

sentences.english: The facility should have a process waste water discharge permit.
sentences.chinese: 受核工厂须领有加工厂废水排放许可证。

sentences.english: However, a participant took the view that the number of seats should dovetail with the future constitutional system.
sentences.chinese: 但有嘉宾认为，议席数目须与未来的政制衔接。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客户经理须具备经营数百万美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: "Lucrece, " quoth he, "this night I must enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 佳丽，今夜，你须归我享用。

sentences.english: Section 3. Cardholders are required to comply with this Code of Practice.
sentences.chinese: 第三条持卡人须遵守本守则。

sentences.english: Transitive verb must be followed by an object.
sentences.chinese: 及物动词之后须带宾语。
除了美德，一切须有节制。

sentences.english: An appropriate number of rooms in another hotel must be tentatively reserved.
sentences.chinese: 须在另一家酒店暂时预订适当的房间数。

sentences.english: Documents must be presented for negotiation within 10 days after shipment date.
sentences.chinese: 单据须正在拆船后10天内提示议付。

sentences.english: But Mr Obama also has a lot to prove.
sentences.chinese: 但是奥巴马先生也须做大量努力来证明自己。

sentences.english: First, the government should allocate resources for promoting economic development.
sentences.chinese: 首先，预算案须拨出资源推动经济发展。

sentences.english: Assign 2 hours to shipowner to control the vessel when on trial.
sentences.chinese: 在试航过程中，须分配两小时给船东作自作操控。

sentences.english: Our days should be as carefully tended.
sentences.chinese: 我们的日子也应如此须得到细心照应。

sentences.english: The bank must be on top of 25 world bank.
sentences.chinese: 出证银行排名须为世界前25位内。

sentences.english: Raw Space Exhibitors have to carpet, design and construct their own floor space.
sentences.chinese: 展览光地参展商须自行设计及盖建展位，并铺上地毯。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 许可证持有人须为驻工地建筑工人提供流动洗手间。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale
key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind
must/to need to/to be sure to
must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
all are OK/both are OK/all can/both can/also can
